except::HandlerInterface

except::HandlerInterface Class Reference

A class for handling notification events While this class used to service only Throwable events, it was extended to provide a status message and a warning message. These events propogate to the HandlerInterface, usual via macro, and any derivation of this interface will define how to handle this notification event. The default implementation, used by ExceptionFactory if nothing is provided simply throws the error or exception. More...

Detailed Description

A class for handling notification events While this class used to service only Throwable events, it was extended to provide a status message and a warning message. These events propogate to the HandlerInterface, usual via macro, and any derivation of this interface will define how to handle this notification event. The default implementation, used by ExceptionFactory if nothing is provided simply throws the error or exception.
